issue.title: Remove Field Array on Control Input Causes value to disappear.

repository.name: react-hook-form
repository.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

issue.body:
**Describe the bug**
Using field array, with Controller. By removing an index, causing value of all index above it to disappear.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Click on 'Add'
2. Enter value '1'
3. Click on 'Add'
4. Enter value '2'
5. Click on 'Add'
6. Enter value '3'
7. Click on 'Remove', next to value '2'
8. See the value '1' disappear, and only '3' remains.

**Codesandbox link (Required)**
https://codesandbox.io/s/infallible-sound-0luwh?file=/src/ar.js

**Expected behavior**
Value '1' remains in the first input box.

body: hey i am getting the same issue. i am using version `5.4.2`. when do you plan to release the fix ?

> Thanks @stanislav-bilanenko you are right, it's due to Controller.
> 
> https://codesandbox.io/s/frosty-williams-h8cy4?file=/src/src/controller.tsx

Encountered problem with deleting the fields. Steps to reproduce:
1. click on append and fill in the name input
2. click on append to generate a new name input but this time not filling it in
3. delete the empty name input generated in step 2
4. delete the name input in step 1

get the following error:
TypeError
data.slice is not a function
@kabriel use an officially and updated CSB from the doc. https://react-hook-form.com/api#Controller

It works! Thanks!

When I am trying to remove from nestedarray it get this error `TypeError: Cannot assign to read only property '1' of object '[object Array]'`

I was append values from modal after close the modal. It only works in parent array but it does not work in nestedarray
